about_the_game:
In Coin Smith, you’ll:

  • Click the golden coin to generate wealth.

  • Build structures like the Blacksmith Hammer, Coin Garden, and Lydian Caravan to automate your coin production.

  • Strategically upgrade your assets to maximize profits.

  • Reset your progress to gain prestige level for permanent bonuses, unlocking new layers of progression.

Addictive Gameplay

Start with a simple click and grow your empire into a sprawling network of automated wealth generation.

Unique Structures and Upgrades

Build a variety of visually distinct structures, such as:

  • Blacksmith Hammer: Your humble beginning, forging the first coins.

  • Lydian Caravan: Expanding your wealth through trade.

  • Galactic Smelter: Reach for the stars and turn asteroids into coins!

Pixel Art Charm

Immerse yourself in a retro-styled world brought to life with detailed pixel art. Every structure you build is a visual delight, from glowing forge flames to mystical gardens.

Prestige and Replayability

Reset your progress to unlock permanent bonuses and discover new layers of depth. With each prestige, your path to riches becomes faster and more rewarding.

Why Play Coin Smith?

Whether you're a seasoned clicker fan or new to the genre, Coin Smith offers a blend of simplicity, strategy, and charm. This is the game that keeps you coming back for more.

name: Coin Smith
short_description: Welcome to Coin Smith, an addictive idle clicker game where your journey to unimaginable riches starts with a single tap. Set in a world inspired by the ancient Lydian Empire, the birthplace of coins, you'll build, upgrade, and strategize your way to wealth and glory.
